Description:
The game is a dynamic arcade shooter with a "view from above". Using drugs in it, does not seem to have,
but it will kill the drug in large quantities. The main character, a brave commando named Rick Quinn
has one goal - To rescue his daughter, which fell into the hands of the infamous drug cartel. In general, all
"in the best traditions."

Features:
- Drop in / drop out Multiplayer. (offline/online)
- Customise and Upgrade your weapons.
- An exhilarating blast to the 80s.
- 12 challenging missions.
